segments.text: I need some more amenities , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure I'm following you , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Specifically , I'm talking about the little things , like soap and shampoo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , now I understand ! So , you've already used up all your amenities ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm not even halfway through my supply .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm losing you , sir . What's the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the use of going to a hotel if you don't take home souvenirs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I got it . You're collecting souvenirs !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There you go . My friends expect me to bring home souvenirs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you visited our souvenir shop , sir ? It's loaded with all kinds of items .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never paid for a hotel souvenir in my life , and I don't intend to start now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , housekeeping will bring you a basketful of amenities momentarily .
segments.speaker: S2
